clauses.title: You are not being tracked
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".

clauses.title: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information
clauses.description: The service does not require users to reveal personal information for most of its website. However, it may still collect anonymous logs.
clauses.clause_text: All data collected is anonymised, and we do not share it with third parties.

case.text: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

clauses.title: Your personal data is not shared with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text:
Who we share your data with

No one

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text: Our web server retains access logs (which do not contain any visitor IP addresses) for the purposes of troubleshooting and security.

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we might hold about you

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used
clauses.description: There are no Google Analytics or other tracking codes embedded in the service. Any tracking is performed by the service itself.
clauses.clause_text: we collect some statistics on the visits and actions (like clicks) on our website using Matomo, a self-hosted open source web analytics platform that gives us 100% data ownership.

case.text: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used

clauses.title: Pseudonyms are allowed
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.
clauses.clause_text: You are of course free to use a fake name and a pseudonymous email address.

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last update of this policy: 20 of may of 2021

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
